nodes.text: The Pressylla system was a star system located in the Outer Rim Territories of the galaxy. It had one star, a red dwarf, which had three orbiting planets, all of which were inhospitable. The system also hosted Pressy's Tumble, an artificial asteroid field which was a base of mining operations for the First Order. Shortly before the Attack on Tuanul, Captain Phasma suppressed a strike at the Pressy's Tumble refinery complex.
The Pressylla system first appeared Before the Awakening, a 2015 junior novel by Greg Rucka.
